== Need Help? ==
 ''' Don't worry, we're all here with an overwhelming passion to give a hand on whatever you face.
 You won't only receive support from your local team, but you can also get Consistent and instant support from Ubuntu community around the World. '''
<<BR>>
=== Please pick Any/All of the following support means: ===

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-eg|IRC]]</nowiki>. (''Language: Arabic, English,'' {*} '''''Instant Support''''' {*} ).

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/questions/ask|Ask Ubuntu]]</nowiki>. ''(Language: English Only, Doesn't need subscription, the '''most efficient method to Request Support''')''.

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://egypt.ubuntuforums.org|Forums]]</nowiki>. ''(Language: Arabic, English)''.

 {*} <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+filebug|Report a Bug!]]</nowiki>. ''(Language: English Only, Needs registration to <nowiki>[[https://login.Launchpad.net|Launchpad.net]]</nowiki>)''.

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://fb.com/ubuntueg|Facebook page]]</nowiki>. ''(Language: Arabic, English)''.
